summary: Cryptocurrency wallet application with multi-token support (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, Infinity Coin)
architectural_notes: Uses ICRC-1 standard for token balance queries across multiple ledgers
Supports ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin tokens
Implements ckBTC minter client for Bitcoin bridge functionality
Uses Internet Computer agent with local development root key fetching
known_issues: Total Assets USD value displays as 0.00 for small amounts - needs extended decimal precision
ckBTC deposit status query fails with 'Not a vector type' decoding error
Multiple actor creation warnings about duplicate agent/agentOptions parameters
